alert.note: Alert for Bracken; Mason (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 3:59PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHWESTERN MASON, BRACKEN, SOUTH CENTRAL CLERMONT AND SOUTHWESTERN BROWN COUNTIES THROUGH 430 PM EDT... At 359 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Brooksville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Maysville, Georgetown, Ripley, Aberdeen, Augusta, Brooksville, Dover, Higginsport, Germantown, Chilo, Bradford, Powersville, Johnsville, South Ripley, Utopia, Chatham, Tuckahoe, Minerva, Woolcutt and Neave. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for northern Kentucky...and southwestern Ohio. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
